Package com.spire.pdf.security

Interface Summary
IGenerateTimestamp Created by sky.luo on 2020/5/8.

Class Summary
PdfCertificate Represents the Certificate object.
PdfSecurity Represents the security settings of the PDF document.
PdfSignature Represents a digital signature used for signing a PDF document.
